ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Wanna train together soon? I’m always down.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Here, take this. I found it lying around.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2101_02_10: Keep it handy. Maybe it’ll help you out sometime.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2102_01_10: Hey, look what I brought. You can have it.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here’s a present from yours truly, since you’re a
rookie with a bright future ahead of ya!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
You’re good enough for me to notice you, so keep
doing your best!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2103_03_10: Look sharp! I’m rooting for you!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2202_01_10: Hey. Got any stories to share with me?
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
A chat with you is never boring,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Huh, a present for me? Thanks! I’ll take it!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2301_01_10: You figured out what I like! Color me impressed!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Next time, it’ll be my turn to get YOU a gift.
Just you wait—it’s gonna blow your mind!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! See ya next time!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2401_01_10: That was a blast. Thanks for hanging out with me!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’ll keep an ear out for some interesting stories
and tell them to ya next time!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
One way to get stronger is to network with a lot
of different people!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8001_0701_02_10: Pasio is the perfect place for doing just that.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
I’m absolutely gonna use that to my
advantage, too!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8002_0701_01_10: Gramps has a lot of experience teaching...
ch0021_00_green_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
In fact, I hear he was a decent Trainer himself
back in the day! I should ask him for a
few pointers.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Pokémon Professors are good at explaining stuff,
so that’s definitely a skill worth learning!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Be sure to sleep and eat well before you start
something big. That’s rule number one!
ch0021_00_green_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
If you don’t take care of yourself, your rivals will
blow right past you.
ch0021_00_green_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
As for me, I’ve been making sure the meals I eat
are better than what Red’s having!
